txt.en: 'Those poor dwarves! They met their doom before they could feast their eyes upon the splendour of Moria! Our victory over this gate is a bittersweet one for me.\n\n'I would like to honour the fallen, [placeholder]. Perhaps you can plant a banner at their graves, so that we will all remember their bravery and sacrifice.'
'That was a good deed, [placeholder]! Thank you for honouring my stalwart friends. I hope they rest well in sight of the halls of their forefathers.'
'The graveyard is just outside, if you wish to pay your respects.'
R치thulf grieves for the dwarves who lost their lives to the Watcher in the Water.
Planted a banner to honour the dwarves
Plant a banner at the grave of the fallen dwarves
Outside of the Hollin Gate lies a small graveyard where the fallen dwarves lie.\n\nYou should plant a banner at the graveyard just outside the Hollin Gate.
R치thulf is at Durin's Threshold in Moria.\n\nYou should return to R치thulf and tell him of your service to the fallen dwarves.
